SIG_VIEW.text:EN: Well done you found a key/you Know the architecture of the database now
SIG_VIEW.text:FR: Bravo tu as trouvé une clé/Vous connaissez maintenant l'architecture de la base de données

DATABASE.users: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {prefix}users(id_user BIGINT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, user_login VARCHAR(60), user_pass VARCHAR(255), user_email VARCHAR(100), user_first_name VARCHAR(50), user_last_name VARCHAR(50), user_registered_UTC DATETIME, user_status VARCHAR(50), user_role VARCHAR(50)) ENGINE=INNODB;
DATABASE.flags: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {prefix}flags (id_flag INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, flag_name VARCHAR(50), flag_key VARCHAR(512), flag_encrypt VARCHAR(512), flag_view INT ) ENGINE=INNODB;
DATABASE.comment: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {prefix}comment (id_comment INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, comment_author VARCHAR(50), comment_date DATETIME, comment_datetime_gmt DATETIME ) ENGINE=INNODB;
DATABASE.comment_meta: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS {prefix}comment_meta (id_comment_meta INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, id_comment INT, FOREIGN KEY (id_comment) REFERENCES {prefix}comment(id_comment) , meta_key VARCHAR(255), meta_value LONGTEXT ) ENGINE=INNODB;
